Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

CreativeWork.name: about
CreativeWork.description: The subject matter of the content.

CreativeWork.name: accountablePerson
CreativeWork.description: Specifies the Person that is legally accountable for the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: aggregateRating
CreativeWork.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

CreativeWork.name: alternativeHeadline
CreativeWork.description: A secondary title of the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: associatedMedia
CreativeWork.description: The media objects that encode this creative work. This property is a synonym for encodings.

CreativeWork.name: audio
CreativeWork.description: An embedded audio object.

CreativeWork.name: author
CreativeWork.description: The author of this content. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangabely.

CreativeWork.name: awards
CreativeWork.description: Awards won by this person or for this creative work.

CreativeWork.name: comment
CreativeWork.description: Comments, typically from users, on this CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: contentLocation
CreativeWork.description: The location of the content.

CreativeWork.name: contentRating
CreativeWork.description: Official rating of a piece of content—for example,'MPAA PG-13'.

CreativeWork.name: contributor
CreativeWork.description: A secondary contributor to the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: copyrightHolder
CreativeWork.description: The party holding the legal copyright to the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: copyrightYear
CreativeWork.description: The year during which the claimed copyright for the CreativeWork was first asserted.

CreativeWork.name: creator
CreativeWork.description: The creator/author of this CreativeWork or UserComments. This is the same as the Author property for CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: dateCreated
CreativeWork.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was created.

CreativeWork.name: dateModified
CreativeWork.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified.

CreativeWork.name: datePublished
CreativeWork.description: Date of first broadcast/publication.

CreativeWork.name: discussionUrl
CreativeWork.description: A link to the page containing the comments of the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: editor
CreativeWork.description: Specifies the Person who edited the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: encodings
CreativeWork.description: The media objects that encode this creative work

CreativeWork.name: genre
CreativeWork.description: Genre of the creative work

CreativeWork.name: headline
CreativeWork.description: Headline of the article

CreativeWork.name: inLanguage
CreativeWork.description: The language of the content. please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard.

CreativeWork.name: interactionCount
CreativeWork.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this item—for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

CreativeWork.name: isFamilyFriendly
CreativeWork.description: Indicates whether this content is family friendly.

CreativeWork.name: keywords
CreativeWork.description: The keywords/tags used to describe this content.

CreativeWork.name: mentions
CreativeWork.description: Indicates that the CreativeWork contains a reference to, but is not necessarily about a concept.

CreativeWork.name: offers
CreativeWork.description: An offer to sell this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, the DVD of a movie, or tickets to an event.

CreativeWork.name: provider
CreativeWork.description: Specifies the Person or Organization that distributed the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: publisher
CreativeWork.description: The publisher of the creative work.

CreativeWork.name: publishingPrinciples
CreativeWork.description: Link to page describing the editorial principles of the organization primarily responsible for the creation of the CreativeWork.

CreativeWork.name: reviews
CreativeWork.description: Review of the item.

CreativeWork.name: sourceOrganization
CreativeWork.description: The Organization on whose behalf the creator was working.

CreativeWork.name: thumbnailUrl
CreativeWork.description: A thumbnail image relevant to the Thing.

CreativeWork.name: version
CreativeWork.description: The version of the CreativeWork embodied by a specified resource.

CreativeWork.name: video
CreativeWork.description: An embedded video object.

MediaObject.name: associatedArticle
MediaObject.description: A NewsArticle associated with the Media Object.

MediaObject.name: bitrate
MediaObject.description: The bitrate of the media object.

MediaObject.name: contentURL
MediaObject.description: Actual bytes of the media object, for example the image file or video file.

MediaObject.name: duration
MediaObject.description: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.

MediaObject.name: embedURL
MediaObject.description: A URL pointing to a player for a specific video. In general, this is the information in the src element of an embed tag and should not be the same as the content of the loc tag.

MediaObject.name: encodesCreativeWork
MediaObject.description: The creative work encoded by this media object

MediaObject.name: expires
MediaObject.description: Date the content expires and is no longer useful or available. Useful for videos.

MediaObject.name: height
MediaObject.description: The height of the media object.

MediaObject.name: playerType
MediaObject.description: Player type required—for example, Flash or Silverlight.

MediaObject.name: regionsAllowed
MediaObject.description: The regions where the media is allowed. If not specified, then it's assumed to be allowed everywhere. Specify the countries in ISO 3166 format.

MediaObject.name: requiresSubscription
MediaObject.description: Indicates if use of the media require a subscription  (either paid or free). Allowed values are yes or no.

MediaObject.name: uploadDate
MediaObject.description: Date when this media object was uploaded to this site.

MediaObject.name: width
MediaObject.description: The width of the media object.

properties.name: transcript
properties.description: If this MediaObject is an AudioObject or VideoObject, the transcript of that object.
